frontmatter.title: 데이터베이스 / Database
frontmatter.description: This course covers fundamental concepts of database and database management systems and how to build and query your own database using Structured Query Language. In addition, you will learn a theoretical background for designing a **good** database and basic techniques for concurrency control and recovery.

items.title: W16: (보강) NoSQL, 빅데이터, 그리고 확장된 데이터 모델
